dotnetType.name: DataContractEnumResolverCase
dotnetType.summary:
A type resolver case that matches <see cref="T:System.Enum" /> types, taking
            <see cref="N:System.Runtime.Serialization" /> attributes into account.

returns.summary:
A successful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Resolution.EnumResolution" /> result if <paramref name="type" /> is an
            <see cref="T:System.Enum" /> type; an unsuccessful <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.UnsupportedTypeException" />
            result otherwise.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataContractEnumResolverCase extends Chr.Avro.Resolution.DataContractResolverCase
